abstract.original_text: in patients from Rostovon-Don, Russia. Serologic analysis showed evidence of high risk of exposure to D. repens. Surveillance studies on prevalence and prevention effectiveness of canine infection are needed to control this emerging zoonosis. DISPATCHES 150 Emerging Infectious Diseases • www.cdc.gov/eid • Vol. 13, No.
